title: What is the purpose and scope of "In The Way of the Human" in relation to Quantum Psychology and spirituality?
first_phrase: In this concluding portion of "The Way of the Human," Quantum Psychology introduces the idea that including our animalistic and emotional nature is crucial for us to realize the underlying unity of our Quantum nature. The text aims to complete and define the dimensions of awareness, and ultimately encourage readers to go beyond awareness and reach the VOID OF UNDIFFERENTIATED CONSCIOUSNESS. The author acknowledges that readers may encounter new challenges in exploring these concepts and invites them to question their existing beliefs about the universe.
content: I am 12 Chapter 1 sure you will notice as you go through the material, that there are overlaps from previous work. Some of the material is similar, some dissimilar. Some of it is new, some are additions, clarifications, new translations or evolutions of other materials "I've" written about. The purpose of this is a completion for Quantum Psychology at the level of awareness so that ultimately "you" go beyond even awareness itself and beyond Quantum Psychology or Quantum Consciousness (see Volume III). By delineating all of these levels you can then consider the possibility of Going Beyond Awareness, Beyond ESSENCE, Beyond the I AM, into the VOID OF UNDIFFERENTIATED CONSCIOUSNESS and into the NAMELESS ABSOLUTE and even BEYOND, which is beyond Quantum Psychology. To enquire in this way you'll face a lot of new challenges. There are many concepts we hold onto to explain the universe which act as sacred cows and prevent us frOm reaching the deeper levels of our own psyche and, consequently, of our humanity. I hope you have not found this opening too heavy-handed.
last_phrase: In conclusion, Quantum Psychology offers a framework for exploring the different levels of consciousness and existence, but its true purpose is to guide us beyond these concepts and into the realm of the nameless absolute. By questioning our beliefs, dismantling our barriers, and embracing the power of sound, we can tap into the quantum splendor of our humanity and reach new heights of understanding and awareness. As you embark on this journey, may you find the courage and curiosity to keep exploring and growing.
